mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_room (Table_Id, Room_Id, Room_PerCoutn, Room_Type, Room_Deposit, Water_Mon, Electric_Mon, Room_Thing, Room_Status, Room_Pic, Create_Man, Create_Date, Update_Man, Update_Date, Remark, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, attribute6, attribute7, attribute8) values (#{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomPercoutn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomDeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waterMon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{electricMon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roomThing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createMan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateMan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_room set Room_Id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Room_PerCoutn = #{roomPercoutn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Room_Type = #{roomType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Room_Deposit = #{roomDeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Water_Mon = #{waterMon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Electric_Mon = #{electricMon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Room_Thing = #{roomThing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Room_Status = #{roomStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Room_Pic = #{roomPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Create_Man = #{createMan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Create_Date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Update_Man = #{updateMan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Update_Date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Table_Id = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Table_Id, Room_Id, Room_PerCoutn, Room_Type, Room_Deposit, Water_Mon, Electric_Mon, Room_Thing, Room_Status, Room_Pic, Create_Man, Create_Date, Update_Man, Update_Date, Remark, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, attribute6, attribute7, attribute8 from t_room where Table_Id = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select Table_Id, Room_Id, Room_PerCoutn, Room_Type, Room_Deposit, Water_Mon, Electric_Mon, Room_Thing, Room_Status, Room_Pic, Create_Man, Create_Date, Update_Man, Update_Date, Remark, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, attribute6, attribute7, attribute8 from t_room

select count(1) from t_room
Room_Status = 3
Room_Status = 2 and to_days(Create_Date) = to_days(now())
Room_Status = 1
DATE_FORMAT(Create_Date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')
group by DATE_FORMAT(Create_Date,'%Y-%m')
